title: In case of death of holder of DRC, the DRC shall be transferred only on production of the documents as may be prescribed by Commissioner from time to time, after due verification and satisfaction regarding title and legal successor
clause_text: In case of death of holder of DRC, the DRC shall be transferred only on production of the documents as may be prescribed by Commissioner from time to time, after due verification and satisfaction regarding title and legal successor.
